name: Trick Or Trash
description:
Made for the 0 hour game jam!

Tap/click pumpkins. avoid clicking the trash.

It's bit laggy i know.

shaun

Music credits: https://freepd.com/music/Horroriffic.mp3

Written by Kevin MacLeod. Suspensful and dark track made with creepy sounds of broken piano and screaming strings. Evolving/Dramatic This music is available for commercial and non-commercial purposes.
